an6.38:4.1: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.38:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an6.38:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.38:4.7: “Māhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, evaṃvādiṃ evaṃdiṭṭhiṃ addasaṃ vā assosiṃ vā.
an6.38:4.8: Kathañhi nāma sayaṃ abhikkamanto, sayaṃ paṭikkamanto evaṃ vakkhati:
an6.38:5.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, atthi ārabbhadhātū”ti?
an6.38:5.5: “Yaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ārabbhadhātuyā sati ārabbhavanto sattā paññāyanti, ayaṃ sattānaṃ attakāro ayaṃ parakāro.
an6.38:6.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, atthi nikkamadhātu … pe …
an6.38:6.9: “Yaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, upakkamadhātuyā sati upakkamavanto sattā paññāyanti, ayaṃ sattānaṃ attakāro ayaṃ parakāro.
an6.38:7.1: Māhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, evaṃvādiṃ evaṃdiṭṭhiṃ addasaṃ vā assosiṃ vā.
an6.38:7.2: Kathañhi nāma sayaṃ abhikkamanto sayaṃ paṭikkamanto evaṃ vakkhati:
